attributes.additional_details: 59% over half the population don’t feel confident with first aid and when somboby stops breathing they need that instant  treatment for a chance.why should people left without a chance?They should be given that 5%chance as it will make a difference. If somebody dies due to a lack of education it’s not their fault it’s yours.
attributes.background: First aid should be taught so if someone needed any treatment on the street they would have a higher chance of survival/minimal injury.And it will reduce the pressure on the NHS as they won’t have to treat as many people beacuse some injuries can be treated on scene.
